title: SNYDER CUT | Batman V Superman Is Deeper Than You Think | SYMBOLISM. PHILOSOPHY. THEOLOGY
description:
With the #SnyderCut of Justice Leauge coming in 2021, it's time to revisit why #BatmanVSuperman : Dawn of Justice is actually one of the deepest comic book movies ever made. #RestoreTheSnyderVerse


In this video we'll explore the philosophical and theological symbolism embedded in Batman V Superman and what it likely means for Zack Snyder's Justice League.

To subscribe to the Deep Talks podcast go to:
https://deeptalkstheologypodcast.podbean.com/

or

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/deep-talks-exploring-theology-and-meaning-making/id1401730159

TO BECOME A PATREON MEMBER GO TO:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast

_______________________________
FAIR USE COPYRIGHT NOTICE

This video and our youtube channel may contain certain copyrighted works that were not specifically authorized to be used by the copyright holder(s), but which we believe in good faith are protected by federal law and the fair use doctrine for one or more of the reasons noted above.
